title: Don't Miss: An inside look at how Valve developed Portal
text:
Don't Miss: An inside look at how Valve developed Portal 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
Erik Wolpaw, Kim Swift & Jeep Barnett explain how and why Valve managed to create its seminal Portal puzzle game in this classic feature rep...
